attributes.action: Stop all future out of town developments for Business Parks and Shopping Malls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to conserve petrol: If we reverse the trend of building out of town shopping centers and business office blocks and bring them back into cities and town shopping centers then public transport will be far more useable and people won't have to get into cars to go to work or buy their shopping.   Just think of the reduction in traffic if people could use public transport to get to work.   Think of the money the country would save in not using so much petrol.
